summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Requiro Scientia LLC for the period of June 1, 2018, to June 21, 2018. It details account activity, including a beginning balance, withdrawals, and the account's closure, along with service charges incurred during the period.

persons.name: Carlo Gonzales
persons.context: Carlo Gonzales is identified as the relationship manager for the business banking account of Requiro Scientia LLC.

events.title: Account Closure
events.description: The account for Requiro Scientia LLC was closed with a final balance of $0.00.

events.title: Service Charge
events.description: A service charge of $3.00 was withdrawn from the account.

keyFacts: The account for Requiro Scientia LLC had a beginning balance of $339.00 and ended with a balance of $0.00.
A total of $339.00 was withdrawn from the account during the statement period.
The account was closed on June 21, 2018.
A service charge of $3.00 was applied on June 12, 2018.
The account maintained a total combined monthly average balance of $8,670.05.
